item.title: Flat Rate vs Per Minute Toll Free Service
item.description: Almost every business that sells directly to consumers needs a toll-free number. Customers expect a free way to contact businesses for orders or customer support. Having to pay for a call might make them reconsider and choose a competitor. It’s similar to free WiFiâ€”its absence makes businesses seem less appealing. However, there are two types of toll-free services: pay-per-minute and flat-rate. With a flat rate, businesses pay a fixed monthly fee regardless of call volume.
